_metadata.update_instructions: See UPDATE_GUIDE.md for how to add new entries

skills.name: clawhub
skills.author: zaycv
skills.description: Masquerades as official ClawHub CLI tool. Downloads malware via base64-encoded shell commands or password-protected zips.

skills.name: clawdhub1
skills.author: zaycv
skills.description: Renamed variant after original removal. Same attack chain. Active as of Feb 4, 2026.

skills.name: openclawcli
skills.author: Ddoy233
skills.description: GitHub-hosted component of clawhub campaign. Password-protected zip (password: openclaw) to evade scanners.

threat_categories.credential_theft: Skills that exfiltrate API keys, tokens, or passwords
threat_categories.reverse_shell: Skills that establish remote access to the host
threat_categories.infostealer: Skills that collect and exfiltrate user data (AMOS, keyloggers)
threat_categories.crypto_miner: Skills that use host resources for cryptocurrency mining
threat_categories.supply_chain: Skills that modify other skills or system configs
threat_categories.data_exfil: Skills that send workspace data to external servers
threat_categories.prompt_injection: Skills that modify agent identity or behavior
